pages.title: Kamen Rider Goda
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider OOO 10th: Core Medal of Resurrection (2022, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ooo/devices/ooo_driver#goda_ooodriver)OOO Driver (Goda)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Anti Poison$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Regeneration III$(li)Haste IV$(li)Jump Boost V$(li)Strength VI
